::FireBlade::
Fireblade had jsut finished mixing the liquid metal and enrgon when 
SwitchBlade asked for the container. Without looking up from his owrk 
he handed the container across the room to Switchblade.
He began to create a mold for his new blade.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "rAuq" <rauq@t...> wrote:
> ::Switchblade::
> 
> Switchblade puts the final touches on the armour on the arms and 
> legs. Without looking from his work, "Fireblade, hand the that 
> container of small parts beside you," he opens up Condor's chest 
> plates, and begins to work on the transformation mechanism. An 
> interesting idea had struck him, this bot would be more 
> aerodynamic and therefore need some extensive work done on its 
> transformation circuitry. He continues working...
> 
> 
> On 24 Apr 2001, at 3:14, gunthers8@n... wrote:
> 
> > ::FireBlade::
> > FireBlade finished his new plans on his blade. I shall be 7 feet 
long 
> > and with his new provisions to it it will be even more deadly.  
It 
> > had the same abitlity to shoot a burst of flame but now with a 
touch 
> > of a button it would open and a rocket could me fired. He grabbed 
> > some scrap metal and some energon cubes and began the delicate 
fusion 
> > that was taught to him.
